name: Anti-Cheat Rootkit
effect: -3 To Health per Cheat Installed\n-3 To Damage per Cheat Installed\n-3 To Movement per Cheat Installed

name: BonziBuddy
effect: At the end of each turn, discard a System Setting card from your hand

name: CryptoLocker
effect: Cannot install or uninstall Mods unless a card effect makes you

name: Cryptominer
effect: Gives the owner of this card +2 coin at the beginning of your maintenance phase

name: DDoS
effect: You can have more than one 'DDoS' card installed\nOn each of your turns, you have -1 to Bandwith

name: ILOVEYOU
effect: At the end of your maintenance phase, randomly uninstall one Mod. This effect can uninstall this mod

name: Meltdown
effect: Can be installed on computers with 'Firewall' active

name: Memory Leak
effect: At the start of your maintenance phase, double this card's Installed Value cost

name: Spectre
effect: Can be installed on computers with 'Firewall' active

name: Spyware
effect: The original owner of this can play 1 System Settings card from your hand during their turn

name: Stuxnet Worm
effect: At the end of your maintenance phase, flip a coin. On heads, install this Mod on the previous player's computer\nThis action cannot happen if the previous player is 'Offline' or has a 'Firewall' active.
